alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Huerfano County through 445 PM MDT... At 414 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Walsenburg, or 28 miles east of Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Huerfano County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
